description:
My place is right in the heart of Williamsburg. All the hottest spots to go out are walking distance. Right around the corner from the subway. Close to Smorgasburg, Hotel Delmano, East River State Park, Output, Music Hall of Williamsburg, Whiskey Brooklyn, Brooklyn Bowl, Brooklyn Brewery, Brooklyn Winery, McCarren Park & Bushwick Inlet Park. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings and the location. Good for Couples, Solo and Business Trav.

NO PARTIES - Strictly Enforced

The space is large.  Lots of space to store your cloths & luggage.  Both bedrooms are large.  One has lots of windows, both have good light.  There are two (2) ceiling fans in apartment.  The apartment is on the first floor, no need to take stairs or elevator. 

There is a full bathroom with a tub.  The kitchen is stocked with cookware.   Dinning table also has outlets close to it to be able to connect your laptop and phone chargers with ease.

I am in the area and am very responsive.  If you need anything, let me know.

All the top restaurants, bars and clubs are very close.  The Bedford L (first stop in Brooklyn) is a couple streets away.  You are very close to every train off the L and can easily get around Brooklyn and Manhattan.

Bedford L train, Uber, Taxi, Lyft, Nassau G train.

NO PARTIES ALLOWED
name: Huge Historic Brooklyn Loft Minutes from Manhattan
review: Jody's place was clean, comfortable, and convienent for travelers looking to enjoy Williamsburg X Manhattan !
